title: Two Mothers
description:
Synopsis for Two Mothers:
Shunji father just divorce with Kyouko but soon after that, his father married to new women. Now he has new mother and sister but it turn out both of them was sex addicted.

What will happen to him as he love her real mother Kyouko?
